Title: White Heat
Writer: Ivan Goff (screen play), Ben Roberts (screen play), Virginia Kellogg (suggested by a story by)
Actors: James Cagney, Virginia Mayo, Edmond O'Brien, Margaret Wycherly
Plot: A psychopathic criminal with a mother complex makes a daring break from prison and leads his old gang in a chemical plant payroll heist. Shortly after the plan takes place, events take a crazy turn.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 1 nomination.
